about-advisors-brendan: CEO. Moetapele ea tsebahalang ho AI. O sebelisitse bohlale ba mochini ho latela mathata a khoebo a fapaneng lilemong tse mashome tse fetileng.
about-advisors-dawn: PhD ho Computational Biology, Stanford. Ho sebetsa ka marang-rang a neural ho tloha ka 1999. Shebana le ML e sebelisitsoeng le ho ithuta ho tebileng ka tekanyo.
about-advisors-keiran: Sebaka sa polokeho ea litaba le setsebi sa blockchain. Moenjiniere oa pele ho Cloudera le tse ling. Lilemo tse mashome tsa software ea ho haha litsebi le lihlopha.
about-content-text-1: hCaptcha ke ts'ebeletso ea Intuition Machines Inc, AI le khamphani ea ho ithuta ka mochini e shebaneng le metalearning le visual domain ML ka tekanyo. Re aha le ho sebetsa lits'ebetso tse matla haholo tse hohelang lits'ebeletso tsa tlhahlobo ea video le litšoantšo bakeng sa lik'hamphani tsa Global 2000 ho potoloha lefatše.
about-content-text-2: Lintlha tse ngata ka kakaretso li hlahisa litholoana tse ntle. Ho aha le ho boloka boitsebiso bo hlophisitsoeng ka nepo le li-database tse nepahetseng ho nka nako ebile hoa bitsa. hCaptcha ea mantlha e entsoe ho rarolla litlhoko tsa rona ka ho ngola litšoantšo, 'me joale e fumaneha bakeng sa lik'hamphani tse ling tse nang le litlhoko tse tšoanang.
about-intro-text: Re ntse re hola ka potlako mme re lula re batla talenta e ntle ka ho fetisisa ea lefats'e ho liofisi tsa rona tsa lefatše. U ka kenya kopo ka lihokela tse ka tlase.
about-leadership-alex: Sebaka sa polokeho ea litaba le setsebi sa blockchain. Moenjiniere oa pele ho Cloudera le tse ling. Lilemo tse mashome tsa software ea ho haha litsebi le lihlopha.
about-leadership-eli: CEO. Moetapele ea tsebahalang ho AI. O sebelisitse bohlale ba mochini ho latela mathata a khoebo a fapaneng lilemong tse mashome tse fetileng.
about-leadership-todd: PhD ho Computational Biology, Stanford. Ho sebetsa ka marang-rang a neural ho tloha ka 1999. Shebana le ML e sebelisitsoeng le ho ithuta ho tebileng ka tekanyo.
acc-opt-but: Ithute haholoanyane ka likhetho tsa phihlello
acc-opt-text: Na o haelloa ke pono kapa ka tsela e 'ngoe o sitoa ho qeta hCaptchas?
appreciate-in: Re leboha litlatsetso tsa hau. Re tsebise mathata afe kapa afe mme re tla a rarolla ka potlako.
feedback-text: Fana ka maikutlo ka hCaptcha eo u sa tsoa e bona
footer-copyright-text: hCaptcha ke lets'oao le ngolisitsoeng la Intuition Machines, Inc.
home-about-subtitle: E fanoa ke Protocol ea HUMAN
home-about-text-1: hCaptcha e etselitsoe ho rarolla bothata bo boholo ho feta ba mosebetsi ho ithuteng ka mochine: ho ngola lintlha tse ngata ka bongata ka nako e fumanehang, ka theko e tlase ebile e ka tšeptjoa.
home-about-text-2: Lintlha tse ling ka kakaretso li hlahisa litholoana tse ntle ho mechini ea ho ithuta ea mochini. Katleho ea morao-rao ea mehlala e tebileng e lebisitse ho li-database tse kholo, hoo e batlang e le tlhahlobo e itseng ea motho. Leha ho le joalo, ho theha li-database tse kholo tse ntlafalitsoeng ke batho ka Mechan Turk, Setšoantšo sa Borobeli, joalo-joalo ho ea lieha ebile ho theko e boima.
home-about-text-3: hCaptcha e lumella liwebosaete ho etsa chelete ho sebeletsa tlhoko ena ha e ntse e thibela bots le mefuta e meng ea tlhekefetso.
home-about-text-4: Mmaraka oa hCaptcha o matlafatsoa ke HUMAN Protocol, protocol e bulehileng e bulehileng ea tlhahlobo ea batho e tsamaeang ho Ethereum blockchain. Liwebosaete li fumana Human Tokens (HMT) neng kapa neng ha basebelisi ba sebelisa widget ea hCaptcha sebakeng sa bona, 'me lik'hamphani tse ithutang mochini li lefa Human Tokens ho etsa hore data ea bona e ngolisoe.
home-benefits-text-1: Na u hlokometse nako le nako ha u tobetsa koloi u ntse u thusa ho koetlisa sistimi e le 'ngoe ea ho ithuta mochini oa Gigantic mahala?
home-benefits-text-2: hCaptcha e fetola mohlala ona. Ha o sebelisa hCaptcha, lik'hamphani li batla mosebetsi oo basebelisi ba hau ba o etsang ha ba paka botho ba bona. O fumana meputso.
home-benefits-text-3: U batla ho khutlisetsa mokhatlong oa hau oa liphallelo oo u o ratang? hCaptcha e o lumella ho ts'ehetsa liphallelo tsa khetho ea hau ka chelete eo u e fumanang ka ho e sebelisa. Basebelisi ba sebakeng sa hau sa marang-rang ba tla khona ho bona tlatsetso ea hau molemong oa ho fana ka liphallelo ka mokhoa o bohlale oa ho hlahisa sebopeho sa hCaptcha.
home-challenge-text-1: Khetha litšoantšo tsohle tse lumellanang le potso
home-challenge-text-2: Hlalosa sebaka se tlamang bakeng sa lintho
home-challenges-text-1: ... le mesebetsi e meng e bonolo. E bonolo bakeng sa batho, e thata bakeng sa bots.
home-challenges-text-2: Mesebetsi ea tloaelo e fumaneha hape bakeng sa bahatisi ba likhoebo.
home-ent-1: U batla linyehelo tsa rona tsa ts'ireletso ea khoebo?
home-ent-2: Etela sebaka sa rona se secha se inehetseng: BotStop.com
home-from-the-blog-value: Kamoo Litlhophiso tsa Mathata a hCaptcha li Sebetsang Kateng
home-intro-body: O sebelisa Captcha ho tima bots? hCaptcha e sireletsa lekunutu la basebelisi, e putsa libaka tsa marang-rang, 'me e thusa lik'hamphani ho ngolisoa ha lintlha tsa bona. Ke phetoho ea ho tlohella reCAPTCHA: o ka chencha metsotso e seng mekae.
home-intro-head: Emisa bots. Qala ho sireletsa boinotšing ba hau.
home-main-1: Ke lekunutu. Sireletsehile. Kapele. 'Me re u lefa hore u e sebelise.
home-main-2c: Marang-rang a papatso a bona baeti ba hau e le sehlahisoa. Bakeng sa hCaptcha sehlahisoa ke mosebetsi oo ba o fang. Ha re tsotelle hore na basebelisi ba hau ke bomang, hore na ba na le menyetla e mekae ea hore ba ka ba khopo. Re ts'ehetsa mats'olo a ts'oanang le boithuto ba lekunutu, 'me re sebetsa ka thata ho lekana lekunutu le polokeho.
home-main-3c: Ho nepahala ho teng molemong oa hau le oa rona. hCaptcha e tsepamisitsoe mohopolo. Re sebeletsa ho u fa datha ea nnete mme re u tlohella hore u nke qeto ea hore na u e sebelisa joang. Likepe tse ling li fanoa ke
home-main-4c: Meetso ea ho ithuta ea mochini oa Sophisticated e sebelisoa ke hCaptcha ho khetholla botho. Sena se re lumella hore re hloke mesebetsi e nyarosang e tsoang ho basebelisi ba hau mme re nke nako ea bona ho etsa joalo, re ntse re hlahisa lintlha tsa bohlokoa tse ngolisitsoeng bakeng sa bareki.
home-main-plans: hCaptcha e lokolohile ho sebelisoa bakeng sa baphatlalatsi ba boholo bofe kapa bofe. Leha ho le joalo, bakeng sa likhoebo le sethala tse hlokang taolo e eketsehileng, tharollo ea khoebo ea rona ea fumaneha.
home-main-plans2: Tharollo ea khoebo ea hCaptcha e sireletsa basebelisi ba limilione ho liwebosaete tse mashome a limilione bakeng sa lik'hamphani tse ling tse kholo lefatšeng. Ka kopo ikopanye le rona bakeng sa tlhaiso-leseling e batsi, kapa u etele
home-main-plans3: Tharollo ea khoebo ea hCaptcha e sireletsa basebelisi ba limilione ho liwebosaete tse mashome a limilione bakeng sa lik'hamphani tse ling tse kholo lefatšeng. Ka kopo ikopanye le rona bakeng sa tlhaiso-leseling e batsi, kapa u etele
home-plans-chart-row-1-cell-1: Mefuta ea phephetso ea taolo e bonts'itsoeng
home-plans-chart-row-11-cell-1: Litšobotsi tse tsoetseng pele tsa ho tlaleha
home-plans-chart-row-2-cell-1: Laola dikahare tsa phephetso tse sebelisitsoeng
home-plans-chart-row-3-cell-1: Fumana meputso bakeng sa litharollo tsa batho
home-plans-chart-row-5-cell-1: E sebetsa naheng e 'ngoe le e' ngoe
home-plans-chart-row-6-cell-1: GDPR le leano le ikemetseng la CCPA
home-plans-chart-row-7-cell-1: Maemo a boima a bonoang hantle
home-plans-chart-row-8-cell-1: Qolla litaba tsa phephetso ea hau
home-plans-chart-row-9-cell-1: Kemiso ea nako e thehiloeng ho nako
home-try-it-out-text: hCaptcha e fana ka tlhahlobo e bonolo, e bonolo, le e tšepahalang ea bot ha e ntse e le ntho e sa reng letho hore batho ba e rarolle.
labeling-about-text-1: hCaptcha e etselitsoe ho rarolla bothata bo boholo ba basebetsi ho ithuteng ka mochini; ho ngola dintlha tse kholo tsa data ka nako e nepahetseng, e theko e tlase ebile e tšepahalang. Lintlha tse ling ka kakaretso li hlahisa litholoana tse ntle ho mechini ea ho ithuta ea mochini. Katleho ea morao-rao ea mehlala e tebileng e lebisitse ho li-database tse kholo, mme hCaptcha e sebeletsa tlhoko ena.
labeling-about-text-2: Leha ho le joalo, ho theha li-database tse kholo tse hlahlojoang ke batho ba sebelisang mekhoa ea setso ho ea lieha ebile ho theko e boima. hCaptcha ke tsela ea lik'hamphani ho fumana litlatsetso tseo ba li hlokang ka potlako, ka boleng bo phahameng le ka theko e tlase ho feta mefuta e meng.
labeling-annotations-text-1: Ho fumana ntho e nepahetseng litšoantšong le video
labeling-annotations-text-2: Ho fumana ntho e nepahetseng litšoantšong le video
labeling-annotations-text-3: Qoqisa lintlha mabapi le linyeoe tse ngata tse fapaneng tsa tšebeliso
labeling-annotations-text-4: Hlophisa kapa u kenye likarolo tse hanyetsanang tsa boholo bofe kapa bofe
labeling-annotations-text-6: Na u hloka mofuta o mong o sa thathamisitsoeng moo? Ak'u re botse feela.
labeling-ent-button: Ikopanye le sehlopha sa rona sa tharollo ea likhoebo
labeling-ent-head: Na u hloka taolo ea ho isa pheletsong?
labeling-ent-text-1: Karolo ea HUMAN ka morao ho hCaptcha e fana ka boleng ba mosebetsi bo hloahloa le likarolo tsa taolo ka ho beha sebakeng, hybrid, kapa li-SaaS tse ikopantseng le lits'ebetso tsa hau tse teng.
labeling-ent-text-2: Matha ka hohle-hohle ka basebetsi ba hau, boleng ba pina bo jeroang hohle ho li-unit tsa khoebo kapa balekane ba kopanetsoeng, khetha ka kotloloho mesebetsi ho bafani ba fapaneng ba kahare kapa kantle ho latela litlhoko tsa litšenyehelo le tsa polokeho, le tse ling.
labeling-ent-text-3: Ho fihlella habonolo ha API, li-dashboards tse ntle, le theknoloji ea morao-rao ea thekeng ho eketsa katleho.
labeling-ent-text-4: 99.99% uptime SLAs le tšehetso ea lefats'e ea 24/7 e fumanehang. Bakeng sa tlhaiso-leseling e batsi:
labeling-features-head-1: Lipeipi tse bonolo tse tsamaisoang ke API.
labeling-features-head-2: E etselitsoe litšenyehelo le boleng. Ha ho boitlamo bo tlang pele.
labeling-features-head-3: Lefa feela ho nepahala hoo o ho hlokang.
labeling-features-head-4: Fana ka datha ea hau ea 'nete ea fatše kapa re re e hahe ka fofa.
labeling-features-text-1: U batla ho kenyelletsa tlhahlobo ea batho ka kotloloho mesebetsing ea hau ea khoebo? Re fana ka li-SLA tse phahameng tsa ts'episo, bokhoni bo tiisitsoeng, le li-REST APIs tse bonolo.
labeling-features-text-2: Sethala sa HUMAN se sebelisa mefuta e felletseng ea kholiseho ho etsa tlhahlobo ea boleng ba nako ea nnete ea sejoale-joale. Sena se re lumella ho tseba ka potlako mathata a lipotso le karabo ea tsona e nepahetseng, re u boloke nako le chelete.
labeling-features-text-3: Ha se mathata ohle a tšoanang. Litemoso bakeng sa mesebetsi e bohlokoa bakeng sa polokeho li ka hloka kholiseho ea 99.99% ho basebetsi ba batho ka botlalo. Litemoso bakeng sa tšobotsi e le 'ngoe ea beta ho app ea lipapali tsa mobile li ka hloka feela boitšepo bo itekanetseng. U nka qeto.
labeling-features-text-4: O na le data e tala ntle le sete e netefalitsoeng ea netefatso? Maemong a mangata re ka o hahela e le mesebetsi e tsamaeang ka sistimi, kapa re iketsetse disampole tse ngolisitsoeng bakeng sa tumello ea hau.
labeling-info-text-1: Bua le e mong oa litsebi tsa sebaka sa rona sa marang-rang ho hlalosa litlhoko tsa projeke: ho nepahala ha sepheo, sebopeho le litlhoko life tse ikhethang.
labeling-info-text-2: Re etsa mosebetsi o fokolang oa tlhahiso ho latela mohlala oa hau oa mohlala. Sena se lekola mosebetsi oo re o entseng hammoho ho netefatsa hore o fumana hantle seo o se hlokang.
labeling-info-text-3: Ka molumo oa rona o phahameng le le latency e tlase re tla fetola mosebetsi oa hau kapele, ka ho tsamaisa ka tsela e iketsang hang ha e felile.
labeling-info-text-4: Ha re ntse re utloisisa haholoanyane likarolo tsa mosebetsi oa hau oa tlhahiso, liphetho li tla tsoela pele ho ntlafala ha nako e ntse e feta.
labeling-info-text-5: Li-dashboards tsa Live li u lumella ho fana ka tlhahiso kapa tlhahiso ea ho phomola neng kapa neng.
labeling-main-1: Ya data e sebetsang e theko e tlase ka bongata
labeling-main-1-button: Fumana Tlaleho ea Hao ea Hona Joale
labeling-main-1c: Na u hloka lileibole tse ling bakeng sa li-database tsa hau? hCaptcha e fana ka litefiso tsa data tse potlakileng, tse theko e phahameng, le tse phahameng bakeng sa lik'hamphani tse sebetsang ka bohlale ba maiketsetso le lits'ebetso tsa ho ithuta mochini.
labeling-main-2-button: Reka lits'ebeletso tsa Labeling tsa Boitsebiso
labeling-main-2c: hCaptcha e na le e 'ngoe ea matamo a maholo ka ho fetisisa lefatšeng a fumanehang bakeng sa hau. Hore na ke boholo ba hau hakae, re ka khona ho sebetsana le eona ntle le boitlamo bo boholo ba pele. Mesebetsi ea limilione ka letsatsi ha e na bothata.
labeling-platform-head: Boitsebiso ba lekunutu kapa ba sechaba
labeling-platform-text: hCaptcha e hahiloe holim'a HUMAN Platform, e lumellang sephethe-phethe sa tlhahlobo le tlhahlobo ho ntlafatsa litšenyehelo le katleho mohatong o mong le o mong. Bohlale bona bo lumella basebeletsi ba nepahetseng hore ba tšoare karolo e 'ngoe le e' ngoe ea mosebetsi oa hau, ba eketsa ts'ebetso ea litšenyehelo ha ba ntse ba boloka boinotšing le ho fihlela litlhoko tsohle tsa taolo tse ka sebetsang.
labeling-try-button: Reka lits'ebeletso tsa Labeling tsa Boitsebiso
labeling-try-head: U batla ho e leka ka data ea hau?
labeling-try-text: ... re itokisitse ha u le: ts'ebeletso ea rona e fumaneha ho pota nako eohle.
page-acc-faq-1: Potso: Na karolo ea hCaptcha 508 + WCAG 2.0 e lumellana? Karabo: Re lumela joalo: basebelisi bohle ba nang le mokhoa ofe kapa ofe oa ho senyeha ba khonang ho bala marang-rang le ho kenya mongolo ka liforomo ba ka fihlella lits'ebeletso tse sirelelitsoeng ke hCaptcha ha motho a ingolisa. Leha ho le joalo, ana ha se likeletso tsa molao: o tlameha ho etsa tlhahlobo ea hau, ho nka ts'ebetsong ts'ebetso ea hau e itseng ho netefatsa hore ho joalo bakeng sa ho romelloa ha hau.
page-acc-faq-2: Potso: Na u ntse u sebeletsa menyetla e meng ea phihlello (a11y), joalo ka audio? Karabo: Likhetho tse pele tse tummeng joaloka audio Captchas li khetholla basebelisi ba bangata ba a11 mme li hloloa habonolo ke mekhoa ea kajeno ea ho ithuta mochini. Sena se qobelletse mathata a hona joale a molumo ho ba thata le ho feta, ho hlahisa lerata, nako e sa tloaelehang, ho kopana ha mantsoe ka mokhoa o sa tloaelehang, joalo-joalo ho hlola bahlaseli. Ka hona ha re na cheseho haholo ka mokhoa ona khahlanong le ho qoba phephetso ka botlalo, empa re tla e nka haeba ho na le tlhokahalo ho tsoa ho sechaba sa a11y. Leha ho le joalo, re khahliloe haholo ke Lekunutu la Boitsebiso bakeng sa tšebeliso ea phihlello. Re lumela ho kopanya mokhoa oa rona oa hona joale oa a11y le phumano ea Lekunutu la Boikarabello ho tla lumella basebelisi ba11y ho bala ka mokhoa o sireletsehileng, ba sireletsehile tsebong ea hore sephethephethe sa bona se sephiri haholo, ha ba ntse ba thibela tlhekefetso ke barekisi ba bot e sa hlaheng ha likhetho tsa11 li fumaneha. Re karolo ea mafolofolo sehlopheng se sebetsang sa IETF se emeng le theknoloji ena e ncha.
page-acc-faq-3: Potso: Ho thoe'ng ka ho ba boinotšing? Na ngodiso e pepesa datha tsa ho bala tsa a11 ka tsela e itseng? U etsang ka lengolo-tsoibila? Karabo: hCaptcha e etselitsoe sephiri ho tloha fatše ho ea holimo. E fapane haholo ho feta likhetho tsa setso tse kang reCAPTCHA tse nang le marang-rang a lipapatso, tse nang le tšusumetso ea ho u ts'oants'a ho pota websaete le ho u kopanya le boitsebahatso ba 'nete. Ha ho mohla re sebelisang li-imeile tse fumanehang kapa tlhaiso-leseling ka sepheo leha e le sefe ntle le ho nolofalletsa ts'ebeliso ea11y le ho thibela tlhekefetso. Leano la rona la lekunutu le na le likarabo tse felletseng le tse matla mabapi le hore na re sebelisa data joang, empa karabo e khutšoane ke hore ha re na thahasello ea ho o kopanya joaloka motho ea nang le nalane ea hau ea ho bala.Le rona ha joale re ntse re sebetsa ka tharollo ea "grafiken" ea ho lahla aterese ea hau ea lengolo tsoibila ha re ntse re boloka bokhoni ba rona ba ho thibela tlhekefetso, re tlatselletsa mosebetsi oa rona oa Lekunutu la Boitsebiso.
page-acc-link-1: Haeba u mosebelisi oa phihlello, ka kopo ingolisa mona.
page-acc-subhead: Ho netefatsa phihlello ea marang-rang bakeng sa basebelisi bohle ha ba ntse ba boloka ts'ireletso
page-acc-summary-contents-1: hCaptcha e etselitsoe ho emisa bots ka ho ba khetholla bathong. Liteko tse bonoang ke sesebelisoa se bonolo bakeng sa sena, empa ha se motho e mong le e mong ea ka rarollang bothata ba pono. Ka lebaka lena re entse moralo o bonolo, o se nang bohloko ho tlohella bahatisi ba sebelisang tšebeletso ea rona ho boloka phihlello ho bohle ka ho lumellana ka botlalo Karolong ea 508 le WCAG 2.0.
page-acc-summary-contents-2: Kamoo e sebetsang ka teng: pele, mosebelisi oa ho fihlella o saena ho URL ena, e hokahaneng le leqephe la tlhahisoleseling ea widget hCaptcha. Ba fuoa cookie e patiloeng e ka sebelisoang makhetlo a 'maloa ka letsatsi, empa e lokela ho khatholloa ka mor'a lihora tse ling le tse ling tse 24 ka ho kena.Ha ho hlaha phephetso ho mosebelisi ea fumanehang webosaeteng efe kapa efe a sebelisa tšebeletso ea hCaptcha, ba tla feta ka boeona.
page-acc-tr-body: Potso: Ke ntse ke bona phephetso kamora ho beha cookie. Ke eng e bakang see? Karabo: Hangata sena se bakoa ke ho sebelisa sesebelisoa sa mabifi se atisang ho phetoa kapa ho hokahanya li-cookie kapa tokisetso e thibelang li-cookie tse sebakeng se itseng, ka hona cookie ea hcaptcha.com e behiloeng kapa e hlahlojoe ke hCaptcha JavaScript sebakeng se seng. , joalo ka eo u mo etetseng. Li-cookies tsa phihlello ea hCaptcha li sebetsa le libatli tsohle tse tummeng le li-blockers tsa lipapatso ka litlhophiso tsa bona tse tloaelehileng, ka hona liphoso tse tloaelehileng li bakoa ke mangolo a khahlanong le adblock kapa melaoana e ts'oanang e lebileng libaka tse itseng. Tharollo: 1. Whitelist hcaptcha.com le. 2. Haeba u sebelisa sebatli sa Brave, se sa hlaheng (ho tloha ka la 20 Mmesa) se bonahala se se na mofuta oa whitelist ea cookie, e-ea ho Likhetho -> Li-Shields -> Li-cookie ebe u khetha Liee tsohle. 3. Haeba u sebelisa mofuta oa morao-rao oa Safari ho OS e sa tsoa hlahisoa ea OS 10 10.15 kapa iOS 13. 4, Apple e sa tsoa fetola boitšoaro ba Safari bo amanang le li-cookie tsa mokha oa boraro, e li thibela kaofela ha tsona. Re kenya tharollo, empa hajoale, ka kopo etela Likhetho tsa Safari, karolo ea lekunutu, le ho se latele pina ea Marang-rang: Thibela tšitiso ea libaka tse fumanehang marang-rang ho etsa hore cookie e fumanehang e sebetse kamoo ho neng ho lebelletsoe. Potso: Ke sebelisa lisebelisoa tse ngata. Na ke hloka ho ingolisa makhetlo a mangata? Karabo: Che. Ka kopo tlanya sehokelo se tšoanang sa ho kena ka imeile se u romelletsoeng ho sesebelisoa ka seng seo u se sebelisang ho etsa cookie.
page-acc-tr-title: Bakeng sa Basebelisi ba Fumanehang: Tataiso ea Q&A le Tataiso ea Mathata
priv-hc-text: Marang-rang a papatso a u bona u le sehlahisoa sa 'ona. Ha re etse joalo. Ha re tsotelle hore na basebelisi ke bo-mang, hore na ba na le menyetla e mekae ea ho ba lonya. Re ts'ehetsa mats'olo a ts'oanang le boithuto ba lekunutu, 'me re sebetsa ka thata ho lekana lekunutu le polokeho.
reporting-bugs-accessibility-button: Ithute haholoanyane ka likhetho tsa phihlello
reporting-bugs-accessibility-text: Na o haelloa ke pono kapa ka tsela e 'ngoe o sitoa ho qeta hCaptchas?
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-head: Ho tšohla lintlha tsa Tlaleho ea Pholo ea Firefox
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-1: Mohato oa 1: Bulela Lisebelisoa tsa Moqapi (Sena se qala ho hatisa thuto.)
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-2: Mohato oa Bobeli: Tobetsa ho tabo ea Network ho Lisebelisoa tsa Moqapi. Sheba lebokose la mela la Persist ka holimo.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-3: Mohato oa 3: etela https://accounts.hcaptcha.com/demo, kapa sebaka sa marang-rang seo u nang le bothata ho sona (Tsebiso ea lekunutu: ha feela u sa tsotelle ho arolelana seo u leng sona) ... ebe u tobetsa ea I Ke konopo ea motho, 'me u leke ho e rarolla.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-4: Mohato oa 4: Tobetsa HAR kamora hore u leke ho rarolla, ebe u khetha ho boloka tsohle joalo ka HAR ho boloka marang-rang. Romella faele eo ho rona.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-5: Mohato oa 5: Tobetsa ho konopo ea Console, 'me u tobetse ka ho le letona ebe u Khetha lintho tsohle ebe u li boloka faele ea mongolo, e le hore u ka boloka letlapa la konopo. Re romelle seo le rona.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-6: Bohato ba ho qetela: Re romelletse li-file tsa HAR le khokahano ea marang-rang, 'me u re hlalosetse bothata. Sebelisa: support@hcaptcha.com (ka kopo sebelisa ts'ebeletso e kang Dropbox kapa Filebin' me u romelle li-link) le khetho ea skrini haeba u belaela hore ho na le ho hong ho sa bonahatseng hantle. . Ka kopo romella IP eo u e sebelisang. U ka e fumana ho tsoa https://www.whatsmyip.org/ Thanks bakeng sa ho ipha nako ea ho re thusa ho fumana leseli lena! Re ikemiselitse ho etsa hore hCaptcha e sebetse hantle bakeng sa e mong le e mong.
reporting-bugs-guide-head: Ho tšoara Lintlha tsa Tlaleho ea Phoso: Chrome
reporting-bugs-guide-step-1: Mohato oa 1: Bulela Lisebelisoa tsa Moqapi (Sena se qala ho hatisa thuto.)
reporting-bugs-guide-step-2: Mohato oa Bobeli: Tobetsa ho tabo ea Network ho Lisebelisoa tsa Moqapi. Sheba lebokose la polokelo la polokelo ka holimo.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-3: Mohato oa 3: etela https://accounts.hcaptcha.com/demo, kapa sebaka sa marang-rang seo u nang le bothata ho sona (Tsebiso ea lekunutu: ha feela u sa tsotelle ho arolelana seo u leng sona) ... ebe u tobetsa ea I Ke konopo ea motho, 'me u leke ho e rarolla.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-4: Mohato oa 4: Tlanya Export HAR (motsu o tlase) kamora hore u leke ho rarolla, e bolokang marang-rang a marang-rang. Romella faele eo ho rona.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-5: Mohato oa 5: Tobetsa ho konopo ea Console, 'me u tobetse ka ho le letona ebe ue boloka .. e le hore u ka boloka letlapa la konsarete. Re romelle seo le rona.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-6: Mohato oa ho qetela: Re romelletse li-file tsa HAR le khomphutha 'me u hlalose bothata. Sebelisa: support@hcaptcha.com (ka kopo sebelisa ts'ebeletso e kang Dropbox kapa Filebin 'me u romelle li-link) le khetho ea skrini, haeba u belaella hore ho na le ho hong ho sa bonahatseng ka nepo. Ka kopo romella IP eo u e sebelisang. U ka e fumana ho tsoa https://www.whatsmyip.org/ Thanks bakeng sa ho ipha nako ea ho re thusa ho fumana leseli lena! Re ikemiselitse ho etsa hore hCaptcha e sebetse hantle bakeng sa e mong le e mong.
reporting-bugs-guide-text-1: Ho romella lintlha tse bolotsana le tlaleho ea hau ho tla re nolofalletsa haholo ho tseba hore na ho etsahalang. Litaelo tsa mohato ka mohato ke tsena:
reporting-bugs-guide-text-2: Haeba u moqapi oa marang-rang kapa mosebeletsi oa marang-rang, kakaretso ke hore re ka lakatsa hore u re romelle netweke e rekotang marang-rang a HAR le li-browser tsa li-browser. Ka kopo leka ho koala sekhahla se fe kapa se fe sa thekiso ea lipapatso ebe u leka hape pele u feta mehatong ena. Haeba seo se lokisa bothata ba hau, re kanna ra u leboha ha u re tsebisa mofuta oa sebatli sa hau, sebatli kapa katoloso ea sebatli le URL ea webosaete.
reporting-bugs-intro-head: O fumane bug? Tsela ea ho e tlaleha ke ena.
reporting-bugs-intro-text: Batho ba limilione ba sebelisa hCaptcha khoeli e 'ngoe le e' ngoe, ka makhetlo a likete-khetlo ho li-browser, li-extensions, lisebelisoa, li-firewall le tse ling. Pakane ea rona ke ho etsa bonnete ba hore e ea u sebeletsa kamehla, ka hona re leboha litlaleho tsa hau haholo! Ho fana ka maikutlo a potlakileng, tobetsa feela konopo ea ho re romella maikutlo. Haeba u bona bothata bo sebetsang, ka kopo latela litaelo tsa ho lokisa seporo bakeng sa litaelo tsa log kapa tsa debug tsa Firefox ka tlase. Bakeng sa libatli tse ling feela re romelle lengolo-tsoibila. Bakeng sa mathata a ts'ireletso kapa boits'oaro ba sephiri, bona litaelo tse ka tlase.
reporting-bugs-privacy-text: Ha re tsotelle hore na basebelisi ke bo-mang, feela hore na ba na le menyetla e mebe kapa mechini e mekae. Re ts'ehetsa mats'olo a ts'oanang le boithuto ba lekunutu, 'me re sebetsa ka thata ho lekana lekunutu le polokeho. Haeba u fumane bothata boo u nahanang hore bo ka ama boits'ireletso ba basebelisi, ka kopo re romelle imeile ho support@hcaptcha.com.
reporting-bugs-provide-feedback-head: Fana ka maikutlo hanghang ka hCaptcha
reporting-bugs-provide-feedback-text: Re leboha litlatsetso tsa hau. Re tsebise mathata afe kapa afe mme re tla a rarolla ka potlako.
reporting-bugs-security-text: Kamehla re thahasella ho fumana litlaleho tsa litsotsi tsa ts'ireletso. Romella imeile@hcaptcha.com & CC security@hcaptcha.com mme re tla khutlela ho uena kapele. Re boetse re na le program ea bug bounty ea litlaleho tse loketseng tsa ts'ireletso tshebeletsong ea hCaptcha le khoutu e amanang le eona.
sec-hc-text: hCaptcha e tsepamisitsoe mohopolo. Re sebeletsa ho fana ka lisaete tsa nnete mme re ba tlohelle hore ba nke qeto ea ho e sebelisa. Ho nepahala ho teng molemong oa hau le oa rona. Barekisi ba bang ba fanoa ke lik'hamphani tsa papatso. Bothata bo bong le bo bong boo ba bo thibelang bo ka fokotsa chelete ea bona.
what-is-hcaptcha-text: hCaptcha e thusa lits'ebeletso tsa hau tsa marang-rang tseo u li ratang ho boloka bots, spam le tlhekefetso ka ho botsa lipotso tse bonolo tse bonolo ho batho le tse thata bakeng sa mechini.
why-hc-text: Nako le nako ha u araba phephetso, re sebelisa mehlala ea maemo ho tseba hore na u motho kapa mochini. Webosaete eo u e etetseng e sebelisa sepheo sena ho thusa ho ntlafatsa boiphihlelo ba hau sebakeng sa bona ka ho boloka bots.
